body:
who the hell said you could create a symbolic link on a file located in /usr/ with a simple user under Linux? 

even if I run the script with sudo, the installation directory becomes /root/.fvm, not for my user, 

bug I'll get a permission error afterwards

comments.body:
@gaetan1903 is attempting to deploy a commit to the **FlutterTools** Team on [Vercel](https://vercel.com).

A member of the Team first needs to [authorize it](https://vercel.com/git/authorize?team=FlutterTools&type=github&job=%7B%22headInfo%22%3A%7B%22sha%22%3A%225ef5127f1be9a24eb5a2d659be8359e9635e7a8d%22%7D%2C%22id%22%3A%22QmUuuLUSWX23i8WKnASJ5wECnEGFd2nogjd3qVAZ9MQS6o%22%2C%22org%22%3A%22leoafarias%22%2C%22prId%22%3A785%2C%22repo%22%3A%22fvm%22%7D).

title: Update install.sh
